reviews.review_text: In truth, the restaurant is excellent and the staff is also outstanding and smiling. The food is delicious and usually fresh, unlike other restaurants. Additionally, the prices are much better than Vancouver. The surrounding environment may also play a role in this.

One of the best McDonalds locations, Design of store is very nice Food is also good. Service is fast and staff are nice. This branch is larger and features kids place as well. It is relatively clean. It can get busy. Drive through is usually not so busy though.

I had a fantastic experience thanks to the friendly crew member, Rogan, at this establishment. She took the time to answer my questions about a particular happy meal toy my son was looking for. The restaurant is also one of the cleanest compared to others in Richmond.
Hans has an amazing personality. Dude needs a raise cause most works at other places seem to be grumpy.
Clean, fast order . But not healthy

This Mc branch specializes in providing a taste that takes you back in time to the original joint, the burgers are beefy/meaty the flavors are spot on. P.S. the dessert is not that good so, y all know whats recommended.
Open 24 hours and little to no wait when very late/early.
The customer service here is great. I ordered a lot of happy meals and they got each order right down to the mcnugget sauces and nothing was missing in my giant takeout order. Impressed!
My go-to place for morning coffee since its so close to work. Staff are always very quick & friendly especially Angie at the drive through window.   Bonus - my order is correct every time!

What a nice location.  They have a couch and a lot of booth seating. They also have a small Play Place for kids open from 7-9pm. The Habanero Bacon Egg McMuffin was messy and had a ton of sauce dripping out of it.  I don t suggest you eat it in your car.

These guys are just the BEST. Every McDonalds should strive to be McDonalds on No.3 Rd. ong. Food always ON POINT, cheese always CENTERED (looking at you Alexandra McD). I never doubt this team with my order cuz even at 3:40AM they can STILL deliver a hot and fresh burger   . Truly the tightest ship ever run in McDonalds history.

Apparently this is the first McDonalds in Canada. Which is kinda cool...Cooler than that is their portions!!! I got a large fry that was enough for 4 kids.  Super busy location but they did a pretty good job. My only complaint would be that the garbage was overflowing and they pushed it down and it was overflowing 2 mins later. Parking: Off to the side but ample parking Kid-friendliness: Playland

This is my favorite Mcdonalds store. Very friendly staffs and excellent service. I would recommend this branch of mcdonalds. Parking: Accessible location just across the City Hall of Richmond along Grandville Street.
Was very fast and efficient. Food was also way better than most McDonalds. The atmosphere was just really loud Food : 5/5
I know McDonald s is McDonald s but from the ambient, cleanliness, to the food presentation, quality and freshness was amazing! We need more McDonald s to follow this the footsteps of this branch!

Best McDs fries in the Lower Mainland. Great playplace, felt safe, the music can be weird sometimes as it changes languages. Comfortable seats, nice spot to sit for a coffee while the kids play. Bathrooms are orderly, mostly. Parking is great. Ice cream machines are always down here. Always check your order before driving or sitting down, they seem to be forgetful here but are great with customer service.
Open 24 hours.

This place was so clean. Staff was very friendly! During the lunch rush there wasnt staff yelling at anyone, if they had anything to say they would directly address any issue to the people up front.   It was so nice and my kids loved the play place it was really nice and so clean. Id def come back here

Nice environment with many tables and children s playground, we had sausage egg and cheese McGriddle meal, which came with the sandwich, a hush brown, and a small coffee. We also used the coupon and only spent $10.50 for 2 meals. It s my favorite.
This should be one of the best McDonalds around it was the 1st McDonalds open in all of Canada 1967  This should be well-set-up well clean and a well oiled engine in this place
Only sad thing was the mc double.. it was as sad as can be and very deceiving from what is seen in the pics

Did a pickup. Pretty quick considering I expected to wait a while but it came within 3 mins and the server was friendly, sorry for the cold though. I ate at the restaurant before, it is nicely renovated but some.patrons spoil it all.

Been coming to this location since the 70s, some 50 years now. It should be proclaimed as a heritage sight. Always fast and friendly service. Hats off to the staff who are always fantastic  everytime.
My local McDs is always a pleasure to go to.
My go to McDonalds in Richmond.. when i ask for fresh fries i always get fresh fries..
This restaurant is so busy that the food is actually good too.
My favorite mcD all these years people are so friendly
Large parking lot. Pleasant interior. fast service.
This place is always open, food here is always fast and good

Best service ever!!! Mostly i order online from this restaurant and food is always fresh and warm, sometime they don t put mayonaise in the bag i asked for but main is food which is best. Even if i walk in they will treat you kindly and with a big smile always. Highly recommended this one from all Richmond locations.
Silvy provided amazing customer service at McDonalds today, with a cheerful and friendly attitude. She made my visit an enjoyable experience.
Oldest McD in the country. Has decent parking space and sitting area. Good experience.
Love that this McDonalds has lots of high chairs. Very happy with service. Always busy so sometimes its hard to get a table. Management is accountable and engages with guests.
Food just as expected. One of the tidiest McDonalds I have ever visited in the town. Love the play area for children Food was ready in just 5 minutes. The staff were friendly.

Probably the best McDonalds in Richmond, especially for dine-in. Ive had two errors total after eating there once per week for years, and both times the issue was immediately rectified. Staff are nice and easy to deal with, were a little annoying about mask theater during the wuhan pandemic thing, but were never rude or aggressive so its not enough to warrant a loss in rating. Nowadays its business as usual, and Im yet to have any issue.
Good McDonald location, drive through, easy parking

Went with the family,  we got ice creams and donuts.  Indoor dining is open so Im glad we got to sit inside... Inside, there are stickers for waiting and arrows stickers showing the way...  And some tables are closed off for safe social distancing.  It felt quite safe there (for covid). On the door of the bathroom theres a sticker of one person at a time,  so they trying to take all the measures and its nice. They have parking outside. They have special curbside pickup parking and many people came and went from there so they were quite busy.  They were very helpful too with getting cleaners right away with any spills. Would be going there again soon!  Would recommend it anytime!
This McDonald s is close, the first McDonald s open in Richmond very convenient Staff is friendly. The drive through easy to get to off of number three Road.
they did not have the travis scott burger
I dont review fast joints but this location is special. It is the site of the first McDonalds in Canada. Not the original building but have some french fries in a historic site.

Overall the crews in this restaurant have been providing excellent services.  Two days ago, I visited this place again, the kiosk which I placed my order was out of paper.  No receipt was printed out.  I approached the cashier who was free at the moment and asked her for assistance. She was so eager to help me out immediately by providing me with the order # (874).   During my visit this time, I also observed that Silvie, the store manager (I have had a short chat with her before i left so i got to know her name) was very friendly, helpful and postive in providing exceptional services to all customers.
Generally fast, even when busy. Nothing to really to complain about aside from how messy it can get but they clean up very quickly.
The coffee in this McDonalds seems to be better than others

Best McDonald s breakfast I ve ever had :)) The Filipino crew in the early morning are the nicest staff I ve come across. Coffee was A+ Bagels fresh and hash browns crispy. Come here for your Fast food needs

Best McDonald hands down! I usually use the drive through and most times its busy, but they have one of the best systems in place to keep that line moving!  Oh and the staff....  are freaking awesome, give yourself a pat on the back because you all work hard and still manage to always have a smile on your faces! I usually go this location at least once a day, keep up the great work all!!
This is the first mcds in Canada. Their service and food is top tier in Vancouver, especially considering all the crazy things that happen 24/7

This is one of my favorite McDonald s so far. They prepare the meals nicely compared to other ones I ve been to. Note: if you want new fries, say no salt. They gave me  old  fries when I asked for new one. But they gave me fresh fries when I asked for no salt.

This is the first McDonald in Canada so naturally I wanted to see what changes they have made over the year. Besides, I some times to kill before my next appointment. The building is stylishly remodeled have great handicapped parking. However, this place is still busy even with the COVID-19. Not much seating inside near the ordering counter.Great location near the city hall and recreation area.
Probably the nicest, most modern McDonalds around. Fitting as it was the first McDonalds in Canada. Lots of parking, fast drive through. Has a childrens playground as well.
Very nice employees and they always get through lunch rush even though all the students rush in at the same time. B) guilty

I have not had any issues here and I hold Macdonalds to the highest standards. They are industry leaders, you should always have a good experience at Macdonalds. See my other Macdonalds reviews, I only post negatively restaurant reviews after multiple issues.

Clean modern looking store with plenty of seating and fast service.  There was a WC.. washroom... Restroom available.  The Canadian McDonalds has a baked goods display with pastries cookies and similar items.    The staff were friendly and the place was quite busy with many people sitting in the restaurant and 5 or 6 cars in the drive up. Took about 5 minutes to get the food after placing the order.
The first McDonalds in Richmond is always the best in Richmond.
Table service via McDonalds app is quick. Recommended.

Always a busy location but that also means hot fresh food. So far the services I ve received have been fast and well done. Employees are helpful if they do make a mistake and are willing to replace products you are unsatisfied with

I see a number of long termers. Staff that have been there for a while. Thats a sign of a well run business. The food, well.. Its McDonalds. Its standard. But I find that this is a location that I can support due to the staff!
Just sold me a Junior Chicken as a MacChicken hahaha wth

Since their renos, this McDonalds is the best one in town! The inside is very nice, with a huge variety of seating. Employees are efficient and friendly, and the new drive-thru is quick and easy to drive through. The inside feels very modern and much more upscale than I have been used to at a fast food joint.
Customer service is great! Quick, efficient and accurate for orders and appropriate amount of staff for a Sunday lunch rush. Would come back again if Im in the area
Probably the only mcd that gets my order right.

Nearly refurbished place. Nice friendly and replaxed place. If you go early morning be prepared to move your car so their delivery truck can turn around. Guess the developers didnt consider how the big delivery trucks would get around the narrow one way system.
Long line upside at drive thru but went fast enough to get your orders
Cool store, first in Canada!

One of the oldest McDonalds in Richmond I believe. This location is well operated with nice staff. Theyve been kind enough to supply the Richmond Hospital ER with free coffee occasionally. We appreciate you helping us get though night shifts!

Very nice McDonalds I came during the graveyard shift around 6 am the employees are very nice. The service was very speedy and the place was quiet and peaceful. My meal was complete and very well made even looked like an ad for McDonalds. Thank you

This is the first McDonalds ever in the country of Canada. Its reliable and nice that its open 24/7. I have seen a purse snatching take place here around 10:30pm a few months ago; so be aware. Not the greatest area in Richmond. I try not to eat this food but... Come on. Its McDonalds, a longtime tradition haha. Can always count on McDonalds and Starbucks when traveling.
Very kind people, definitely set the bar for proper customer service :)
This a very neat fancy place to have food and hang out with your friends.

Their current covid precautions seem to be working quite well at this location. They are pretty quick at getting orders ready and I do appreciate the one way in and out when people actually follow it.
Probably the best Mc Donalds in the lower mainland. Foods hot and as fresh as you can get from a Mc Donalds.

The first McDonalds in Canada. Nicely renovated 2 years ago. It has an enclosed quiet childrens play area. Theres a cozy feel to this particular McDonalds which offers different areas to eat with booth and open seating.

Ever since  the grand reopening. The drive thru here has been the consistently fastest drive thru in any McDonalds I have ever been to. That deserves a five star. Other McDonalds I would rate 2.5 stars in terms on drive thru speed consistency. I dont mean just going through the drive thru only 2-3 times. I mean going thru at least 10 times.
I dont usually come to McDonalds in Vancouver. This one is impressive. Busy and popular but yet clean, probably the cleanest Ive been to. Has play area for kids.
Best McDonalds in Canada    - Also the first McDonalds in Canada
Food and service is good.
Busy as can be - clean well run and exactly what you expect from a well managed Mac Donald s

The staff in training are up beat. I like ordering the double cheeseburger meal with an extra cheeseburger and to drink, I will mix my Fruitopia mostly orange and 1/3 Strawberry.Please Like to show me I am making a difference. Thx
Always great service

Beware going late in the AMs. Chances of seeing flying burgers and pattys are fairly high; alot of people tend to want to scrap, but the staff have got your back. Overall, good place to go for some late night.
This is the first ever McDonalds here in Canada! So if youre in the area, highly recommend to come by and order something. The modern design, quick service, and theres even a play house for kids!
Service always feels a bit better at this classic location.
Busy place, clean , familys oriented.  No junk or drugs
Your self order machine may not be working properly to charge customers.
A really nice Mcds...funky atmosphere...amazing front line service
Nicely renovated McD.  Lots of parking and double lane drive thru.  Fast service and pleasant worker at pick-up window.
This place after the recent renovation, is the best McDonald I have been in. The parking area is good with both drive through and eat-in. The signature store has modern design and beautiful.
Friendly staffs. But I didnt get my Snoopy from happy meals. They only have rubric cube.
Fast and efficient services, and very friendly staff. I totally recommend anyone who is looking for a quick bite and go, to come to this place. I assure you, they will not disappoint you.
Site of first McDonalds in Canada. Newer building now with interesting unique interior decor. See plaque out front commemorating first McDonalds in Canada June 1st 1967
Very clean. Good interior layout. Parking lot/entrance can be chaotic at busy times.
No complains with this location. They always get my orders right, service is fast even with just 1 employee upfront.
Its ine of the bicest interior Mcdonalds Ive wver seen. Washrooms are clean.
phone order and pick up in the spot the lady who has gold curly hair she is so friendly and nice
Grew up near this McDonalds. Great history being the first McDonalds outside the USA.
McDonalds is a world famous brand name.  Very good food and good quality food is available in this restaurant.thanks
Double quarter pounder with cheese... fries... drink.  Pretty hard to screw up.  Tonight they were fast, accurate and the food was hot.  Scored the McDonalds trifecta!
Great service, staff even went an extra step when our coupon code had a glitch in the app.
New place, clean and organized, professional staff, comfy seats and nice small play area, the breakfast food was good when I tried it
Fun Fact: this was the first McDonalds in all of Canada!!!
A little car line up after 10pm but service is fast and courteous staffs.
